scripts.build: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/js && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/assets && terser src/js/*.js -o dist/js --compress --mangle && javascript-obfuscator dist/js --output dist/js && cleancss -o dist/css src/css/*.css && html-minifier-cli src/html/*.html -o dist --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments && xcopy src/assets dist/assets /E /I /Y && copy CNAME dist\
